channel.title: My server goes down after 13 players online
channel.description:
Yeah.. it goes down afer 13 players online.. no its not realy down.. but than ppl are still logged in. but if they log out, they cant get on anymore..
Dont say: Buy more RAm.
Becus the problems are on the following things
On my own computer with only 448 RAM A dedicated with 10 GB Another hoster with 6 GB Another hoster with 56 GB An vps with 1 GB.
So it isnt my ram.. its something with the files in my server.. i use allstarscape base.. does anyone know the problem?

item.title: My server goes down after 13 players online
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Maybe it has something to do with the people you host or the source you use?

Read full topic

item.title: My server goes down after 13 players online

item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

I dont host… it was same problem for ME, and for all my other hosters (10 others) and the hoster i got now… and the DEDI to… read before you post something.
